snippet: In Katy Pyle’s “Firebird, a Ballez,” romance blossoms between a purple-haired Lesbian Princess and a Firebird in a red-fringed jacket — and between camp and ballet.
abstract: Gia Kourlas reviews premiere of dance piece The Firebird, a Ballez, choreographed by and starring Katy Pyle, at Danspace Project.
lead_paragraph: In Katy Pyle’s “Firebird, a Ballez,” romance blossoms between a purple-haired Lesbian Princess and a Firebird in a red-fringed jacket — and between camp and ballet.

headline.seo: Katy Pyle’s ‘Firebird, a Ballez,’ at Danspace Project
headline.main: Trimming Stravinsky in Purple and Red
headline.print_headline: Trimming Stravinsky In Purple And Red
